name: Raquel Araujo
flavorText: Raquel is a color specialist who loves giving clients easy, low maintenance looks. With over 15 years of experience Raquel believes in constant education to further her craft. If she’s not at the salon she could be found playing life with her husband and 2 kids…. Or at target! She is immensely proud that she has created a team that encourages & supports one another and a space where we bring out beauty.

name: Katie Romaine
flavorText: Katie is a color enthusiast who loves making people feel and look their best! With over 15 years experience, she specializes in wedding hair and balayage. When she isn’t hard at work she is with her two little boys hiking, skiing or just having fun! She loves her family, friends, the beach and eating out! When you sit in her chair you will feel completely at ease and in good hands.

name: Kendra Nop
flavorText: Growing up Kendra Nop had always wanted to be a hairdresser. She has followed in the foot steps of her Aunt. Attending Sussex Technical School for cosmetology has given her the education and drive to be the hairdresser she is today. Having a dual license in NY & NJ for 22 years has given her the opportunity to meet and make clients be comfortable and feel great about themselves. She is a wife of 20 years and a mother of 5 children. Life is busy but she still enjoys attending education classes and workshops. She believes working with a great team of hairdressers at R & Co   a daily workshop!
